scripts.docker:shell:backend: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend sh
scripts.docker:shell:frontend: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec frontend sh
scripts.docker:shell:db: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec db psql -U quizzy_user -d quizzy_dev
scripts.docker:prisma:migrate: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend sh -c 'cd apps/backend && pnpm prisma migrate dev'
scripts.docker:prisma:generate: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend sh -c 'cd apps/backend && pnpm prisma generate'
scripts.docker:prisma:reset: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend sh -c 'cd apps/backend && pnpm prisma migrate reset'
scripts.docker:prisma:studio: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend sh -c 'cd apps/backend && pnpm prisma studio'
scripts.docker:prisma:status: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend sh -c 'cd apps/backend && pnpm prisma migrate status'
scripts.docker:db:tables: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec db psql -U quizzy_user -d quizzy_dev -c '\dt'
scripts.docker:backend:add: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend sh -c 'cd apps/backend && pnpm add'
scripts.docker:backend:add-dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend sh -c 'cd apps/backend && pnpm add -D'
scripts.docker:frontend:add: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec frontend sh -c 'cd apps/frontend && pnpm add'
scripts.docker:frontend:add-dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec frontend sh -c 'cd apps/frontend && pnpm add -D'
